name: Navy  Command, Control, Communications, Computers, Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance
objective: To support basic and applied research at educational, nonprofit, or commercial research institutions, which have potential for leading to the improvement of military operations or dual-use application, and to support training and stimulation of future researchers in science and engineering disciplines.  This support may take the form of grants or cooperative agreements.
applicant_types: Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: Diagnostic testing and identification of pathogens in food and water. Detecting, identifying and classifying anomalous signals.

pons.pon: Increase Professional Development and Training of Individual Researchers
